title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 554.2 - Commencement of operations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 554.2 - Commencement of operations

State Regulations

The regional headquarters administering to the county in
which the well is located shall be notified in writing or by telegram at or
prior to the start of actual drilling operations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
554.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
